title: Comments on Jordan Peterson Article in Chronicle of Higher Ed
description:
And how it informs my understanding of the difference between spoken word and the print word. This of course gets into my continual musings over Postman's https://www.amazon.com/Amusing-Ourselves-Death-Discourse-Business/dp/B000MQ54BC 

The Chronicle Article https://www.chronicle.com/article/whats-so-dangerous-about/242256
